sentences.en: All visitors should report to the porter's lodge.
sentences.cn: 所有来访者都应先到传达室报到。

sentences.en: I struggled with my bags, desperately looking for a porter.
sentences.cn: 我提着行李艰难地走着，迫切地寻找着搬运工。
我给了搬运工人50便士小费.

sentences.en: Mr Porter'sbook was an instant hit.
sentences.cn: 波特先生的书一经推出便大受欢迎。

sentences.en: Our taxi pulled up at Old Delhi station and a porter sprinted to the door.
sentences.cn: 我们的出租车停在老德里车站，一个搬运工疾步跑向车门。

sentences.en: Piquancy was added to the situation because Dr Porter was then on the point of marrying Hugh Miller.
sentences.cn: 当时的情形因正赶上波特博士要和休·米勒结婚，便又多了几分趣味。

sentences.en: Porter stayed within the rules of rhyme.
That idiot porter again knocked on my door!
sentences.cn: 那个白痴行李工又来敲我的门了！

sentences.en: The Head Porter was keeping all the tips.
sentences.cn: 行李员领班扣留了所有人的小费。

sentences.en: The hotel porter will get you a taxi.
sentences.cn: 旅馆的门卫会给你叫出租车的。

sentences.en: The hotel porter will help you.
sentences.cn: 旅馆的门童可以帮你的忙.

sentences.en: The porter and I looked at each other and smiled.
sentences.cn: 我和脚夫微笑着你看着我,我看着你.

sentences.en: The porter distributes incoming letters to the offices.
sentences.cn: 看门人向各个办公室分发来信.

sentences.en: The porter put our scruffy rain-sodden luggage on a trolley.
sentences.cn: 搬运工把我们那些被雨水浸透的脏兮兮的行李放上了手推车。

sentences.en: The train stopped and a porter called out, "Middlesbrough!"
sentences.cn: 火车停站，一名列车员喊道，“米德尔斯伯勒到了!”

sentences.en: The young man who said laboring was beneath his dignity finally put his pride in his pocket and got a job as a kitchen porter.
sentences.cn: 那个说过干活儿有失其身份的年轻人最终只能忍辱,做了厨房搬运工的工作.

words.tran_cn: 港口，口岸；（计算机的）端口；左舷；舱门
转到陆上运输；经陆上运输绕过
门房；服务员；[交]行李搬运工；守门人

trans.tran_cn: 看门人，行李员，列车服务生，护工，搬运工
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to carry people’s bags at railway stations, airports etc
